message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XRV_CLOSED
message.locale: You may not perform this operation as the service plan is closed.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: You can not delete a plan item outcome as the subgoal outcome is already set.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_EXPECTED_OUTCOME_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: An expected outcome has not been defined for this plan item. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_NO_CREATE_PLAN_ITEM_PARAMETER_DEFINED
message.locale: A plan item parameter name has not been defined to allow you to create this type of plan item. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_NO_CREATE_SUBGOAL_PARAMETER_DEFINED
message.locale: A subgoal parameter name has not been defined for this plan item. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_MULTIPLE_RESPONSIBILITY
message.locale: Multiple responsibility options cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_EXPECTED_START_DATE_LATER_THAN_EXPECTED_END_DATE
message.locale: The expected start date must be earlier than the expected end date.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_NO_CREATE_PAGE_DEFINED
message.locale: A page has not been defined to allow you to create this type of plan item. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_NO_VIEW_PAGE_DEFINED
message.locale: A page has not been defined to allow you to view this type of plan item. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_NO_MODIFY_PAGE_DEFINED
message.locale: A page has not been defined to allow you to modify this type of plan item. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XRV_USERS_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: The sensitivity level cannot be higher than that of proposed owner.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_NO_PLANITEMS_DEFINED
message.locale: Plan Items have not been configured for this sub-goal. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_CONTRACT_ISSUED_OR_ACCEPTED_NO_INSERT
message.locale: A new plan item may not be added to this service plan as a contract has already been issued or accepted by the client.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_INPROGRESS_COMPLETED_NO_DELETE
message.locale: This plan item cannot be deleted as the plan item status is In Progress or Completed or Submitted.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_ASSOCIATED_ITEM_NO_DELETE
message.locale: This plan item cannot be deleted as it is associated with another item.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_MULTIPLE_OWNER
message.locale: Multiple owners cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_SUBGOAL_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: The sensitivity level must be at least equal to that of the selected sub-goal.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_OWNER_EMPTY
message.locale: The owner must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_RESPONSIBILITY_EMPTY
message.locale: Responsibility must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_ACTUAL_START_DATE_NOT_ON_OR_BEFORE_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The actual start date must be equal to or earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_ACTUAL_START_DATE_ON_OR_BEFORE_ACTUAL_END_DATE
message.locale: The actual start date must be earlier than actual end date.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_OUTCOME_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: You cannot set outcome to attained or not attained until an actual end date is specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_ACTUAL_END_DATE_AFTER_ACTUAL_START_DATE_ON_OR_BEFORE_ACTUAL_END_DATE
message.locale: Actual end date must be greater than actual start date and equal to or less than todays date.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_ACTUAL_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The actual start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_EXPECTED_START_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Expected start date cannot be modified if an actual start date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_EXPECTED_END_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Expected end date cannot be modified if an actual end date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_START_DATE_NO_CANCEL
message.locale: You cannot cancel the plan item as an actual start date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_EXPECTED_OUTCOME_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: You cannot change the expected outcome as an actual start date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_GOOD_CAUSE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: You cannot enter a good cause value until the outcome value is set to not attained.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_PLAN_ITEM_START_DATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: You cannot enter actual start date as plan item status is unapproved or submitted.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_ESTIMATED_COST_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: The estimated cost cannot be edited after the Plan Item has been approved

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_OWNER_ASSIGNMENT_SUBJECT
message.locale: You have been assigned as the owner of the %1s Plan Item for Service Plan ID %2n.

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_OWNER_ASSIGNMENT_COMMENTS
message.locale: You have been assigned as the owner of the %1s Plan Item belonging to the %2s Sub-Goal.

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RESPONSIBILITY_ASSIGNMENT_SUBJECT
message.locale: You have been assigned as the user responsible for the %1s Plan Item for Service Plan ID %2n.

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RESPONSIBILITY_ASSIGNMENT_COMMENTS
message.locale: You have been assigned as the user responsible for the %1s Plan Item belonging to the %2s Sub-Goal.

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_CHANGE_SUBJECT
message.locale: The Plan Item %1s has been %2s.

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_CHANGE_COMMENTS
message.locale: The Plan Item %1s for Service Plan %2s has been %3s by user %4s.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_SERVICEPLAN_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan

message.name: ERR_CREATE_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to add a plan item to this sub goal

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_SERVICEPLAN_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify this plan item

message.name: ERR_VIEW_SERVICEPLAN_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan

message.name: ERR_VIEW_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this plan item

message.name: ERR_VIEW_PARTICIPANT_ASSOCIATED_CASE_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view the selected plan item.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_EXPECTED_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an expected start date

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_EXPECTED_END_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an expected end date

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must specify a plan item name

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_PLANNED_SUBGOAL_EMPTY
message.locale: You must specify a planned sub goal

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_SUBMITTED_FOR_APPROVAL
message.locale: Submitted for Approval

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_APPROVED
message.locale: Approved

message.name: INF_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_REJECT
message.locale: Rejected

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: The actual outcome cannot be set to canceled as an actual start date has already been entered for the associated plan item
The actual outcome cannot be set to cancelled as an actual start date has already been entered for the associated plan item

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_ACTUAL_OUTCOME_CANNOT_BE_SET
message.locale: The actual outcome cannot be set to attained or not attained as an actual end date has not been entered for the associated plan item

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_EXPECTED_OUTCOME_CANNOT_BE_SET
message.locale: The expected outcome cannot be modified as an actual start date has been entered for the associated plan item

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: A plan item may not be modified as the service plan has been closed

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_EXPECTED_OUTCOME_EMPTY
message.locale: Actual Outcome must be set before the plan item can be closed

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_ASSOCIATED_WITH_CASE
message.locale: This plan item is associated with a case and cannot be deleted

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_NOT_COMPLETED
message.locale: Actual cost cannot be set because the plan item has not been completed

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS_NOTSTARTED
message.locale: Product Delivery can only be created for a plan item that is Not Started

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_ACTUAL_DATES_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Actual start and end date cannot be modified as this plan item is associated with a product delivery

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_ACTUAL_COST_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Actual cost cannot be modified as this plan item is associated with a product delivery

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_CLIENT_PARTICIPATION_RECORDED_NO_DELETE
message.locale: This plan item cannot be deleted as client participation has been recorded.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_RV_ABSENCE_RECORDED_NO_DELETE
message.locale: This plan item cannot be deleted as absence details have been recorded.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLANNED_ITEM_XRV_NEW_AUTH_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_MAX_UNITS
message.locale: The New Authorized Units cannot be greater than the Maximum Units.
The New Authorised Units cannot be greater than the Maximum Units.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLANNED_ITEM_XRV_NEW_AUTH_UNITS_LESS_THAN_TOTAL_UNITS_RECEIVED
message.locale: The New Authorized Units cannot be less than the number of units already received.
The New Authorised Units cannot be less than the number of units already received.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLANNED_ITEM_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Authorized Units cannot be modified as this plan item has not been associated with a type of unit.
The Authorised Units cannot be modified as this plan item has not been associated with a type of unit.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_ASSOCIATED_WITH_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: This plan item cannot be modified as it is associated with a closed product delivery.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_CONCERNING_PARTICIPANT_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Concerning Participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_RECEIPT_DATE_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Receipt Date for Attachment cannot be greater than Current Date.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_FV_PLANNED_ITEM_ATTACHMENT_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: An attachment name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_MANDATORY_IND_TRUE_NO_DELETE
message.locale: This plan item cannot be deleted as it is marked as mandatory in the template

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_ESTIMATED_COST_NON_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The estimated cost cannot have a negative value, the amount must be zero or more.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_ACTUAL_COST_NON_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The estimated cost cannot have a negative value, the amount must be zero or more.
